Game.Title: MLB 13 The Show Home Run Derby Edition

Trophy.Title: Hang a Louie
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run to Left Field. Only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding.

Trophy.Title: Straight as an Arrow
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run to Center Field. Only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding.

Trophy.Title: Hang a Ralph
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run to Right Field. Only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding.

Trophy.Title: Back to Back
Trophy.Description: Hit 2 (or more) home runs in a row. Only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding.
